name: Ultimate Bomb Squad
storyline:
Far into the future, time travel is not only possible but is also a pain in the ass.
Evildoers and rampaging megalomaniacs are trying to break time and space, by blowing up important pieces of time and reality and the only thing in their way is the F.L.U.S.H organization!

Operating in the margin of the continuum and with a very low budget and no active agents, F.L.U.S.H tries to hold time and space together. Suddenly a delivery guy shows up, can he be the hero we need? And more importantly: Is he ok with 10 bucks an hour?
summary:
Ultimate Bomb Squad is a fast-paced loud stealth platformer where you have to be fast, be stylish, and be careful, because every sound you make has consequences.

Defuse bombs, deceive enemies, avoid hazards, shoot and shout your way to save the day now, tomorrow and yesterday.
